00006 InterfaceLayer::InterfaceLayer()
00007 {
00008 
00009     if ( m_defaultTextRenderer.Load( (File*) Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(), string("Data/fonts/default.ttf") )) == false );
00010     {
00011         printf("InterfaceLayer: Unable to load Data/fonts/default.ttf. Continuing, expect errors\n");
00012     }
00013 
00014     m_interfaceTex = 0;
00015 
00016     m_interfaceTex = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getTextureMonitor()->getTexture("Data/gui.tga");
00017 
00018     //Create a vertex set used for the quad drawing function calls
00019     m_quadVertexSet = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newVertexSet();
00020 
00021     //Create a base set of vertices to be copied into the vertex set
00022     float baseVertices[] = { 0, 0, 0,
00023                              0, 0, 0,
00024                              0, 0, 0,
00025                              0, 0, 0
00026                             };
00027

00029                                        0, 0,
00030                                        0, 0,
00031                                        0, 0
00032                                      };
00033 
00034     float baseColourValues[] = { 1, 1, 1,
00035                                  1, 1, 1,
00036                                  1, 1, 1,
00037                                  1, 1, 1
00038                                  };
00039 
00040     m_quadVertexSet->setVertices(baseVertices, 4);
00041     m_quadVertexSet->setTextureCoordinates(baseTextureCoordinates, 4);
00042     m_quadVertexSet->setColourValues(baseColourValues, ctype_float_rgb, 4);
00043 }

00046 {

00048     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->setupFor2D(w, h);

00059 void InterfaceLayer::drawText(int PointSize, int x, int y, std::string Text, FREngine* Renderer)
00060 {
00061 
00062     if (Renderer == 0)
00063     {
00064         m_defaultTextRenderer.Render(PointSize, x, y, Text);
00065     }
00066     else
00067     {
00068         Renderer->Render(PointSize, x, y, Text);
00069     }

00073 void InterfaceLayer::drawQuad(float x, float y, float w, float h)
00074 {
00075 
00076     float* texCoordinates = m_quadVertexSet->getTextureCoordinates();
00077     float* vertices = m_quadVertexSet->getVertices();
00078 
00079     //First point
00080     texCoordinates[0] = 0; texCoordinates[1] = 1;
00081     vertices[0] = x; vertices[1] = y; vertices[2] = 0;
00082 
00083     //Second point
00084     texCoordinates[2] = 1; texCoordinates[3] = 1;
00085     vertices[3] = x + w; vertices[4] = y; vertices[5] = 0;
00086 
00087     //Third point
00088     texCoordinates[4] = 1; texCoordinates[5] = 0;
00089     vertices[6] = x + w; vertices[7] = y + h; vertices[8] = 0;
00090 
00091     //Fourth point
00092     texCoordinates[6] = 0; texCoordinates[7] = 0;
00093     vertices[9] = x; vertices[10] = y + h; vertices[11] = 0;
00094 
00095     m_quadVertexSet->Draw(0, 4, QUADS);
00096 }

00098 void InterfaceLayer::drawQuadWithUIElement(float x, float y, float w, float h, unsigned int element_x, unsigned int element_y)
00099 {
00100     if (m_interfaceTex != 0)
00101         m_interfaceTex->makeActive();
00102 
00103     unsigned int m_uiElementWidth = 64;
00104     unsigned int m_uiElementHeight = 64;
00105 
00106     float u_start = 0;
00107     float u_end = 1;
00108 
00109     float v_start = 0;
00110     float v_end = 1;
00111 
00112     if (m_interfaceTex != 0)
00113     {
00114         unsigned int xPos = m_uiElementWidth * element_x;
00115         unsigned int xEndPos = m_uiElementWidth * (element_x + 1);
00116 
00117         u_start = ((float)xPos) / ((float) m_interfaceTex->getWidth());
00118         u_end = ((float)xEndPos) / ((float) m_interfaceTex->getHeight());
00119 
00120         unsigned int yPos = m_uiElementHeight * element_y;
00121         unsigned int yEndPos = m_uiElementHeight * (element_y + 1);
00122 
00123         v_start = ((float)yEndPos) / ((float) m_interfaceTex->getHeight());
00124         v_end = ((float)yPos) / ((float) m_interfaceTex->getHeight());
00125 
00126     }
00127 
00128     float* texCoordinates = m_quadVertexSet->getTextureCoordinates();
00129     float* vertices = m_quadVertexSet->getVertices();
00130 
00131     //First point
00132     texCoordinates[0] = u_start; texCoordinates[1] = v_end;
00133     vertices[0] = x; vertices[1] = y; vertices[2] = 0;
00134 
00135     //Second point
00136     texCoordinates[2] = u_end; texCoordinates[3] = v_end;
00137     vertices[3] = x + w; vertices[4] = y; vertices[5] = 0;
00138 
00139     //Third point
00140     texCoordinates[4] = u_end; texCoordinates[5] = v_start;
00141     vertices[6] = x + w; vertices[7] = y + h; vertices[8] = 0;
00142 
00143     //Fourth point
00144     texCoordinates[6] = u_start; texCoordinates[7] = v_start;
00145     vertices[9] = x; vertices[10] = y + h; vertices[11] = 0;
00146 
00147     m_quadVertexSet->Draw(0, 4, QUADS);
00148 }

00150 //Message every interface asking if it needs this event - on return true the loop breaks
00151 bool InterfaceLayer::processEvent(Input_Event E)
00152 {
00153     bool isHandled = false;
00154 
00155     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_interfaceElements.size(); i++)
00156     {
00157 
00158         bool cResult = m_interfaceElements[i]->handleInput(E);
00159 
00160         if (cResult)
00161         {
00162             isHandled = true;
00163             break;
00164         }
00165 
00166     }
00167 
00168     return isHandled;
00169 }
